SensorSymphony ATOM 5 The ATOM 5 launched with a model number unknown. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 164.5 x 76 x 8.95 mm and the weight is 193 in grams. Secondly, the display of the ATOM 5 is a 6.74-inch IPS LCD panel with 720 x 1612 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass. Thirdly and most importantly, it is powered by the SC9863A1 and runs on Android 14. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-Core 1.6GHz CPU.The Symphony ATOM 5 phone has a dual-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of an 8MP and 2MP camera. It has a 5MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has one (4GB/64GB) variant.On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC using a dedicated slot. Certainly, ATOM 5 has a 5000mAh battery with 10W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, ATOM 5 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is rear-mounted.On the other hand, there is WLAN, Bluetooth, and a USB port among the other features.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.SpecificationBrandSamsungPlatformOS - Android 14, One UI 6.1 | Chipset - Exynos 1330 (5 nm) / Mediatek Dimensity 6300 (6 nm) | CPU - Octa-core (2x2.4 GHz Cortex-A76 & 6x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) | GPU - Mali-G57 MC2ModelGalaxy A16 5GNetworkTechnology - HSPA, LTE, 5GDimensions164.4 x 77.9 x 7.9 mm | Weight - 200 g | Build - Glass front, plastic back, plastic frame | SIM - Single SIM or Hybrid Dual SIMDisplayType - Super AMOLED 90Hz | Size - 6.7 inches | Resolution - 1080 x 2340 pixelsMemoryCard Slot - microSDXC | Internal - 128GB 4GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAMMain Camera50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 5 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide), 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)Selfie Camera13 MP, f/2.0SoundLoudspeaker - Yes | 3.5mm jack - NoBattery InfoType - 5000 mAh, non-removable | Charging - 25W wiredOther Features / InfoFingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, compassDescriptionSamsung Galaxy A16 5GMeet the new Samsung Galaxy A16 5G, it features a stunning Super AMOLED display that’s one of the best in its class. The phone comes in a slim form factor that provides a good grip and a great hand feel. There’s a triple-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main shooter that takes amazing-quality pictures. It’s powered by a 2.4 GHz CPU that produces enough power to smoothly handle all your tasks. The phone is IP54 certified, which means it’s protected against dust and water. To make things even better, it comes with 6 generations of OS updates for future-proofing. Samsung Galaxy A16 5G FeaturesSlim and elegant design with IP54 dust and water resistance.Sharp and vivid display with thin bezels for an immersive experience.Versatile camera setup to capture high-quality photos. Brand: Apple Model: iPhone 15 Display Size: 6.1 inches Display Type: Super Retina XDR OLED, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000–2000 nits Display Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels Chipset: Apple A16 Bionic (4 nm) Memory: 128GB | 256GB | 512GB Main Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (ultrawide) | Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps, , HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) Selfie Camera: 12 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide) | SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor) | HDR, Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps gyro-EIS Battery Info: Li-Ion | non-removable, wired Type-C charging, 15W wireless (MagSafe) iPhone 15The Apple iPhone 15 features a stunning design that seamlessly marries durability and elegance. Its display sets a new standard for visual excellence, offering a breathtaking visual experience. The dynamic island feature enhances user interaction and convenience. Powered by an unbelievably impressive performance, it tackles any task effortlessly. Photography enthusiasts will adore the enhanced camera capabilities, which deliver outstanding shots. Notably, the introduction of Type-C connectivity marks a significant step forward for the iPhone, making it more versatile and adaptable than ever. The iPhone 15 truly redefines excellence in the smartphone world. iPhone 15 FeaturesThe stunning design is a result of the fusion between color-infused glass and recycled aluminumSuper Retina XDR OLED display with ceramic shield protection for astounding visualA dynamic island pops up on the top to notify users of important alerts and live activities 48 MP main camera with upgraded resolution and lenses for magnificent photographyA16 Bionic with cutting-edge features that elevate performance to utmost smoothnessWith its optimized, high-capacity battery, it can run for an entire day on a single chargeSupports the Universal Type C charger, allowing you to establish a charging ecosystem Roadside Assistance via satellite is the new emergency feature, along with SOS and Crash Detection

The iPhone 15 truly redefines excellence in the smartphone world. iPhone 15 FeaturesThe stunning design is a result of the fusion between color-infused glass and recycled aluminumSuper Retina XDR OLED display with ceramic shield protection for astounding visualA dynamic island pops up on the top to notify users of important alerts and live activities 48 MP main camera with upgraded resolution and lenses for magnificent photographyA16 Bionic with cutting-edge features that elevate performance to utmost smoothnessWith its optimized, high-capacity battery, it can run for an entire day on a single chargeSupports the Universal Type C charger, allowing you to establish a charging ecosystem Roadside Assistance via satellite is the new emergency feature, along with SOS and Crash Detection
